summary: A police inspector is called to Milan to investigate a murder case since he grew up in the same ghetto as the suspect.
cast: Tomas Milian|Bombolo|Olimpia Di Nardo|Nerina Montagnani|Leo Gavero|Aldo Ralli|Tony Scarf|Elisabetta Odino|Lino Patruno|Marina Hedman|Massimo Vanni|Marcello Martana|Mario Donatone|Elio Crovetto|Bruno Rosa|Franco Diogene|Ombretta De Carlo|Vasco Santoni|Antonella Antinori|Jimmy il Fenomeno
title: Asesinato en Puerta Romana
